criteria.name: Clarity
criteria.description: Is the writing clear, concise, and free of jargon? Can the target audience understand it?

criteria.name: Completeness
criteria.description: Does the document cover all necessary topics? Are there obvious gaps?

criteria.name: Structure
criteria.description: Is the document well-organized with logical sections, headings, and flow?

criteria.name: Correctness
criteria.description: Is the content factually accurate? Are code samples correct? No broken links?

criteria.name: Formatting
criteria.description: Is the document properly formatted? Consistent heading levels, lists, code blocks?
